00032 #ifndef I_OPeNDAPAggFactory_h
00033 #define I_OPeNDAPAggFactory_h 1
00034 
00035 #include <map>
00036 #include <string>
00037 
00038 using std::map ;
00039 using std::string ;
00040 
00041 class DODSAggregationServer ;
00042 
00043 typedef DODSAggregationServer * (*p_agg_handler)( string name ) ;
00044 
00052 class OPeNDAPAggFactory {
00053 private:
00054     static OPeNDAPAggFactory *  _instance ;
00055 
00056     map< string, p_agg_handler > _handler_list ;
00057 protected:
00058                                 OPeNDAPAggFactory(void) {}
00059 public:
00060     virtual                     ~OPeNDAPAggFactory(void) {}
00061 
00062     typedef map< string, p_agg_handler >::const_iterator Handler_citer ;
00063     typedef map< string, p_agg_handler >::iterator Handler_iter ;
00064 
00065     virtual bool                add_handler( string handler_name,
00066                                            p_agg_handler handler_method ) ;
00067     virtual bool                remove_handler( string handler_name ) ;
00068     virtual DODSAggregationServer *find_handler( string handler_name ) ;
00069 
00070     virtual string              get_handler_names() ;
00071 
00072     static OPeNDAPAggFactory *  TheFactory() ;
00073 };
00074 
00075 #endif // I_OPeNDAPAggFactory_h
